statements: SELECT * FROM CloudCoverData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM CloudCoverData WHERE cloud_cover > 0.5;
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM CloudCoverData LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT AVG(cloud_cover) FROM CloudCoverData;
SELECT MIN(cloud_cover) FROM CloudCoverData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CloudCoverData WHERE cloud_cover > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(cloud_cover) AS avg_cloud_cover FROM CloudCoverData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM CloudCoverData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY cloud_cover DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM CloudCoverData WHERE cloud_cover < 0.3;
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM CloudCoverData WHERE cloud_cover BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY cloud_cover ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE date = '2022-06-30'
SELECT cloud_cover, date FROM cloud_cover_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_forecasts WHERE is_raining = TRUE
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts ORDER BY temperature ASC, wind_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE cloud_cover > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT cloud_cover, date FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND date < '2023-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, cloud_cover FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE cloud_cover < 0.2
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE is_raining = TRUE ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data;
SELECT id, date, time, cloud_coverage FROM cloud_cover_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location FROM weather_station_info WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE predicted_cloud_coverage >= 0.7;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_time, predicted_cloud_coverage FROM forecast_data ORDER BY predicted_cloud_coverage DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY predicted_cloud_coverage DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station_info WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT MAX(cloud_coverage) AS max_cloud_coverage FROM cloud_cover_data;
SELECT forecast_date, SUM(predicted_cloud_coverage) AS total_predicted_coverage FROM forecast_data GROUP BY forecast_date HAVING total_predicted_coverage > 50;
SELECT * FROM CloudCoverData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT forecast, temperature FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT user_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT actual_weather, forecasted_weather, accuracy_score FROM ForecastAccuracy WHERE accuracy_score >= 0.8
SELECT location, cloud_coverage FROM CloudCoverData WHERE cloud_coverage < 0.5 ORDER BY cloud_coverage ASC
SELECT date, time, cloud_coverage FROM CloudCoverData WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT date, forecast FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT user_id, feedback, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT date, actual_weather, forecasted_weather, accuracy_score FROM ForecastAccuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, cloud_cover_percentage FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE cloud_cover_percentage > 50;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM weather_stations ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT model_name, description FROM weather_models WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT source_name, url FROM weather_data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%weather%' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, cloud_cover_percentage FROM cloud_cover_data WHERE cloud_cover_percentage > 50;
SELECT date, location FROM weather_forecasts WHERE predicted_cloud_cover < actual_cloud_cover;
SELECT w.station_name, w.latitude, w.longitude, m.model_name FROM weather_stations w JOIN weather_models m ON w.id = m.id;
SELECT w.station_name, w.latitude, w.longitude, s.source_name FROM weather_stations w JOIN weather_data_sources s ON w.id = s.id;
